meanings.sent1: I found a few doits in my grandfather's old coin collection.

meanings.definition: To collect or hoard small items.
meanings.sent1: She likes to doits seashells whenever she goes to the beach.
meanings.sent2: He tends to doits old books, never wanting to let them go.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel would doits nuts and hide them all over the garden.
meanings.sent4: She would doits memories in her heart, cherishing each one.
meanings.sent5: The child would doits colorful stones, filling his pockets with treasures.
